content: Have we become so enamored with our U.S. Military might that it has over-shadowed the message of Easter? Easter signifies hope that replaces despair, courage that replaces cowardly acts, love that replaces hate, truth that replaces falsehoods, justice that replaces wrongdoing, and peace that replaces violence. Pray for peaceful solutions to conflicts near and far — and remember that God does not choose up sides. His loving care and grace are available to all people.
